text: Ewen Glass (born 25 December 1982) is an award-winning Irish playwrighthttp://www.doollee.com/PlaywrightsG/glass-ewen.html and screenwriter. Ewen first came to notice in the British film industry as the writer of Basement,http://www.joblo.com/arrow/index.php?id=19924 a feature horror film starring Danny Dyer. ==Filmography== *Basement *A Nurse Called Laura *The Castle and The King *Kamera *We Saw Zebras *Tough Love ==Awards== *Playwright of the Year (Ireland) (2000) https://www.imdb.com/name/nm2454328/bio *Attori in Cerca D'Autore Festival Award (2008) ==References== Category:1982 births Category:Living people Category:Irish dramatists and playwrights Category:Irish male dramatists and playwrights
title: Ewen Glass
